<h2>Economist &amp; Data Scientist</h2>
<p style="text-align: justify;">
I've applied data analysis and visualization to drive strategic value for 10+ years across industries like public security, e-commerce, and healthcare.

<em>(webpages, slideshows, dashboards)</em> that support decision-making, occasionally incorporating regression and classification analyses.<br>
Background in <strong>Economics</strong> (BA), <strong>Information Technology</strong> (MA) and <strong>Data Science & Machine Learning</strong> (Certification).
Committed to fostering data literacy, I share some posts on <code>Learning Data</code> and <code>T3CH</code> via <a href="https://medium.com/@jesus_lmonroy" target="_blank">Medium</a>.
